text: to khuda jis shakhsh ko raah raast dikhaana chaahata hai usake seene ko islaam (kee dauliyat) ke vaaste (saaf aur) kushaada (chauda) kar deta hai aur jisako gumaraahee kee haalat mein chhodana chaahata hai unake seene ko tang dushvaar gubaar kar deta hai goya (kubool eemaan) usake lie aasamaan par chadhana hai jo log eemaan nahin laate khuda un par buraee ko usee tarah musallat kar deta hai
